mdRecord.dcterms:title: Il Maryland, Il Jersey Meridionale, La Delaware, E La Parte Orientale Della Virginia, E Carolina Settenrionale
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Venice; From Guilliaume Thomas Francois Rayna's Storia dell'America Settentrionale, 1778, which contains 12 colored maps. Relief shown pictorially. Large "D" in Atlantic Ocean. Based on the Fry-Jefferson map of Virginia. Shows area from Filadephia [sic] to Cape Lookout and west to conjunction of Ohio and "Gt. Conhaway" rivers. --From This New Founde Lande: The Henry & Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College, 2008.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Zatta, Antonio, active 1757-1797
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Maps
Chesapeake Bay Region (Md. and Va.)
Maps--Early works to 1800
Cartographic materials
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Henry and Kaye Spalding Map Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Henry and Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College; Image appears on pg. 50 (plate 56) of This New Founde Land, Hampden-Sydney College, Virginia, 2008
